description: Unknown. Perhaps from Jalapa, Mexico (now Xalapa), to whose scrap yards used cars were often sent from New Orleans starting in the 1920s. First recorded written use in 1924.

entries.meaning: (US, dated) An old, dilapidated or unpretentious automobile.
examples: Synonyms: banger, beater; see also Thesaurus:old car

entries.meaning: (US, dated, slang) A hip, cool, groovy automobile.
